Introduction

Léa (formerly known as Hana) is a Japanese singer. She is a former member of the girl groups SECRET NUMBER and SKarf.

In October 2017, she became a contestant on the survival show MIXNINE as a individual trainee. She was eliminated in episode 7 after ranking 109th place.

On February 27, she was revealed as the fifth and final member of SECRET NUMBER. The group made their debut on May 19, 2020 with their first single "Who Dis?".

On April 2, 2025, Vine Entertainment announced on their social media that Léa had chosen to leave the group as well as the company.
